languages.text: Миллиарды бесценных специалистов по добыче прометия сгинули на мире во время катастрофы. Чтобы восстановить хоть часть прометиедобывающих мануфакторумов, Вольному Торговцу необходимо найти остатки выживших.

traits.locale_text: Миллиарды бесценных специалистов по добыче прометиума сгинули на мире во время катастрофы. Чтобы восстановить хоть часть пометиумодобывающих мануфакторумов, Вольному Торговцу необходимо найти остатки выживших.

languages.text: Billions of irreplaceable promethium extraction experts perished in the catastrophe on the world. If the Rogue Trader hopes to restore even a fraction of the promethium manufactorums, the remaining survivors must be found.
languages.original_text: Миллиарды бесценных специалистов по добыче прометия сгинули на мире во время катастрофы. Чтобы восстановить хоть часть прометиедобывающих мануфакторумов, Вольному Торговцу необходимо найти остатки выживших.

traits.locale_text: Billions of irreplaceable promethium extraction experts perished in the catastrophe on the world. If the Rogue Trader hopes to restore even a fraction of the promethium manufactorums, the remaining survivors must be found.

Billions of irreplaceable promethium extraction experts perished in the catastrophe on the world. If the Rogue Trader hopes to restore even a fraction of the promethium manufactorums, the remaining survivors must be found.

Billions of irreplaceable promethium extraction experts perished in the catastrophe on the world. If the Rogue Trader hopes to restore even a fraction of the promethium manufactorums, the remaining survivors must be found.

Billions of irreplaceable promethium extraction experts perished in the catastrophe on the world. If the Rogue Trader hopes to restore even a fraction of the promethium manufactorums, the remaining survivors must be found.

languages.text: 这个世界发生了可怕的灾变，数以亿计的专业人员在这场灾难中丧命，这些人都是无可替代的钷素提取专家。如果行商浪人还打算恢复一小部分钷素制造工厂的话，就必须找到剩余的幸存者。
languages.original_text: Billions of irreplaceable promethium extraction experts perished in the catastrophe on the world. If the Rogue Trader hopes to restore even a fraction of the promethium manufactorums, the remaining survivors must be found.

traits.locale_text: 这个世界发生了可怕的灾变，数以亿计的专业人员在这场灾难中丧命，这些人都是无可替代的钷素提取专家。如果行商浪人还打算恢复一小部分钷素制造工厂的话，就必须找到剩余的幸存者。

languages.text: 惑星の大惨事により、何十億人ものかけがえのないプロメチウム抽出専門家が亡くなった。自由開拓者がプロメチウム製造所の一部でも復元したいと思うのなら、残りの生存者を見つけなければならない。
languages.original_text: Billions of irreplaceable promethium extraction experts perished in the catastrophe on the world. If the Rogue Trader hopes to restore even a fraction of the promethium manufactorums, the remaining survivors must be found.

traits.locale_text: 惑星の大惨事により、何十億人ものかけがえのないプロメチウム抽出専門家が亡くなった。自由開拓者がプロメチウム製造所の一部でも復元したいと思うのなら、残りの生存者を見つけなければならない。

languages.text: La catástrofe del mundo se ha cobrado la vida de miles de millones de irremplazables expertos en extracción de prometio. Si {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente espera restaurar incluso una fracción de los manufactorums de prometio, necesita encontrar a los demás supervivientes.
languages.original_text: Billions of irreplaceable promethium extraction experts perished in the catastrophe on the world. If the Rogue Trader hopes to restore even a fraction of the promethium manufactorums, the remaining survivors must be found.

traits.locale_text: La catástrofe del mundo se ha cobrado la vida de miles de millones de irremplazables expertos en extracción de prometio. Si {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente espera restaurar incluso una fracción de los manufactorums de prometio, necesita encontrar a los demás supervivientes.

languages.text: Milliarden unersetzlicher Experten für den Abbau von Promethium sind während der Katastrophe auf der Welt umgekommen. Wenn {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} auch nur einen Bruchteil des Promethium-Manufactorum wiederherstellen möchte, müssen die verbliebenen Überlebenden gefunden werden.
languages.original_text: Billions of irreplaceable promethium extraction experts perished in the catastrophe on the world. If the Rogue Trader hopes to restore even a fraction of the promethium manufactorums, the remaining survivors must be found.

traits.locale_text: Milliarden unersetzlicher Experten für den Abbau von Promethium sind während der Katastrophe auf der Welt umgekommen. Wenn {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} auch nur einen Bruchteil des Promethium-Manufactorum wiederherstellen möchte, müssen die verbliebenen Überlebenden gefunden werden.

languages.text: Des milliards d'experts en extraction de prométhium irremplaçables ont péri dans la catastrophe qui s'est déroulée sur ce monde. Si {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} veut rétablir ne serait-ce qu'une fraction des manufactorums de prométhium, les survivants restants doivent être retrouvés.
languages.original_text: Billions of irreplaceable promethium extraction experts perished in the catastrophe on the world. If the Rogue Trader hopes to restore even a fraction of the promethium manufactorums, the remaining survivors must be found.

traits.locale_text: Des milliards d'experts en extraction de prométhium irremplaçables ont péri dans la catastrophe qui s'est déroulée sur ce monde. Si {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} veut rétablir ne serait-ce qu'une fraction des manufactorums de prométhium, les survivants restants doivent être retrouvés.

languages.text: Dünyadaki felaket nedeniyle yeri doldurulamayacak milyarlarca prometyum çıkarma uzmanı yitmiş. Hür Tacir, prometyum manufaktorumlarının küçük bir kısmını dahi olsa açmayı umuyorsa hayatta kalanların bulunması gerek.
languages.original_text: Billions of irreplaceable promethium extraction experts perished in the catastrophe on the world. If the Rogue Trader hopes to restore even a fraction of the promethium manufactorums, the remaining survivors must be found.

traits.locale_text: Dünyadaki felaket nedeniyle yeri doldurulamayacak milyarlarca prometyum çıkarma uzmanı kaybedilmiş. Hür Tacir prometyum manufaktorumlarının küçük bir kısmını bile olsa açmayı umuyorsa, hayatta kalanların bulunması gerek.
